changes: Added support for rcore_clothing
Introduced default blacklisted Night Vision Goggles in the hair_1 section
Fixed an issue where the [<] button for Hair Highlights was changing Hair Style instead
Fixed a bug that allowed infinite scrolling of values - scrolling is now limited to LMB only
Support for custom interiors - currently available only for Gabz
Added targetCoords option to bossMenu in Config.Barbers
Added blacklist option to Config.Barbers
Introduced a new method for changing item ID in the barber menu - now, when you hold LMB on the left/right arrow, the selected ID will continuously change. No more repeated clicking!
Fixed a bug with the boss menu when using the marker system
Fixed employee-client interaction when using marker access
Fixed sending webhooks
Complete redesign of the resource to ensure consistency across VMS resources
Added management menu, similar to the one in vms_tuning/vms_vehicleshopV2/vms_stores
Added Hair Fade (Compatible only with vms_tattooshop!).
A "basket" has been made - now you don't have to pay for a haircut to go to the beard, you can change everything and pay at the very end
Added a receipt for tattoo payments in the business tattoo shop, similar to the one in vms_tuning/vms_clothestore
Added the ability to set prices for each option separately i.e., for example, hair has been separated into the cost for cutting, coloring, dyeing the ends and style
Introduced compatibility with the tax system and job resumes from vms_cityhall
Compatibility with qb-target
Compatibility with QS-Inventory (Item clothing system)
Moved many options from config.lua to config.client.lua and changed the prefix from Config. to CL.
Moved UI translations to the translations.json file (Multi-language: EN, DE, FR, ES, PT, PL, CZ)
Improved makeup and lipstick color for fivem-appearance
Support for target system - Config.UseTarget, Config.TargetResource, Config.Target
Added setting of camera same for both employee and customer
Added translations in NL thanks to help from VMS Translators Team.
Adjusted scaling for 21:9 monitor format
Fixed an issue with the client skin in a barber that is managed by another player when using illenium-appearance on ESX
Added server-side warning when Config.Core configuration is wrong
Added leaving the chair when the player leaves the game while using the barber service
Corrected the position of the player working as a barber to where he selects the customer's haircut after completing the haircut animation
Added config.translation.lua file with new languages DE, FR, PT, ES thanks to help from VMS Translators Team (moved Config.Translate & Config.Lang here from config.lua file)
Improved illenium-appearance compatibility
Added Config.EnableShakeCam
Improved grade checking for employees
Fixed a bug with the ability to sit on an occupied seat
Added bossMenuPos and bossMenuGrades option to Config.Barbers
Added function Config.BossMenu - by default for esx_society and qb-management
Added Config.Markers
Added Config.UseTattooMachineRequired & Config.TattooMachineItem - you can require employees to have a hair clipper
Changed from busy to taken in each file and changed trigger "...:setBusyChair" to "...:takeChair"
Added the remove hats, glasses, and masks while using hairdressing services, so they do not interfere with choosing new styles.
Removed from config option Config.CanOthers
Hair panel 2 has been removed for the SkinManager qb-clothing as there are no values to change in qb-clothing.
Supporting for illennium-appearance
Fixed checking barber job for QB-Core
Corrected category buttons to click correctly
Removed opacity values on UI for qb-clothing (because it cannot be changed in qb-clothing)
Removed some panels with color 2 values for fivem-appearance and qb-clothing (because it cannot be changed in qb-clothing and fivem-appearance)
Fixed eyecolor and makeup color in fivem-appearance
Fixed problem with character standing up when refreshing skin in qb-clothing
Added 3 translations to translation.js (header name and payment button)
Fixed hair_color_2 in fivem-appearance
Fixed make-up color and added blush first -1 for qb-clothing
Added blushes
Fixed hair_color_2 for fivem-appearance
Compatible with QB-Core
Added comapability with fivem-appearance for ESX and QB-Core
Added missing hair salon
Added config_gabz.lua file, there are coorded for Config.Barbers to gabz interiors
Fixed notifications sent from the server side
New translation options added to Config.Translate
Fixed and added new color variants
